title: Advent Calendar: Starting on December 1st, count the days till Christmas-eve.
description: The purpose of this book is to count down the days until Christmas-eve.You will get to read a Christmas poem each and every day.Itâ€™s easy as select a day number,and read the poem on the next page.So, enjoy, share, and use this calendar every December day and keep counting the days until Christmas-eve.Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year to you and your family.Thank You to the poets of the Christmas Sophia Behal, Dennis Moritz, Frogg Corpse, Carrie Magness Radna, Sailor Uke, Aldo Quagliotti
author: Sophia Behal
